function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Panic buying due to the increase in COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Disruption in retail operations and supply chain","Mitigation":"Implementing purchase limits, ensuring transparent communication to the public on stock availability","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, communication technologies for public information","People":"Retailers, consumers","Owner":"Retailers, government"},{"Description":"Exacerbation of disruptions due to government measures like social distancing","Impact":"Further disruption in retail operations and supply chain","Mitigation":"Implementing contactless delivery and pickup, optimizing online ordering systems","Technologies":"Contactless delivery systems, online ordering platforms","People":"Retailers, consumers","Owner":"Retailers, government"},{"Description":"Adoption of technologies and online shopping due to evolving pandemic situation","Impact":"Change in consumer shopping behavior and reliance on technology","Mitigation":"Investing in e-commerce platforms, improving online user experience, providing digital payment options","Technologies":"E-commerce platforms, online payment systems","People":"Retailers, consumers","Owner":"Retailers"}]}
